entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Tuktoyaktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tuktoyaktuk Airport 2:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -22.4°C
Wind: SE 41 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
